TextView.android:text: The Multimorbidity illness Perception Scale (MULTIPleS)
These questions are about the thoughts and feelings you sometimes experience. Please indicate how much you agree with each statement by ticking the corresponding box
Strongly Disagree
Strongly Agree
One of my conditions is more serious than the others
Time spent managing my conditions has made it more difficult to carry out my usual activities
I feel so overwhelmed by the treatment for one condition it is hard to manage any others
The causes of my conditions are linked
It is difficult to take all my medications the way I am supposed to
Time spent managing my condition has limited my activities
Taking different medications for each of my conditions has caused me problems
I don't like mixing medications for different conditions
Having more than one condition makes my treatments less effective
One of my conditions has caused another
One of my conditions dominates the others
My conditions interact with each other
Having more than one condition makes it difficult to get the best available treatment
Time spent managing my conditions has reduced my social life
Having more than one conditions makes me unhappy
Having more than one conditions makes me more anxious
Having more than one conditions makes me angry or frustrated
Having more than one health problems makes me feel sad
Having more than one conditions makes me more irritable
If I feel sad or depressed, managing my conditions is a struggle
